author: sussman
msg: * autogen.sh, gen-make.py, dist.sh:  activate "svn:executable" property.
* test/clients/cmdline/*.py:  same.

author: rooneg
msg: * packages/freebsd/subversion/files/patch-build::buildcheck.sh
rename this to:
* packages/freebsd/subversion/files/patch-build_buildcheck.sh
in order to avoid problems when people check this out on win32 systems.

author: sussman
msg: Simplify the execute-bit versioning feature (issue #522), using
kfogel's suggestion.  As he said, nobody ever wants to enforce
*non*-executability.  Here's the new behavior:
- If svn:executable is present at all, then run chmod +x for updates,
checkouts, commits, merges, restores, and reverts.
- If we commit a removal of this property, or if we receive an update
which removes it, then run chmod -x.
* translate.c, translate.h (svn_wc__get_executable_prop): delete this
routine.
(svn_wc__maybe_toggle_working_executable_bit): if executable
property is present at all, then run chmod +x.  else do nothing.
* log.c (log_do_committed): deduce propchanges before reinstalling new
prop-base, and possibly run -x after installing the text-base and
(possibly) retranslating the working file.
* update-editor.c (svn_wc_install_file): after deducing propchanges to
be 'merged' into existing props, detect if any of the 3 'magic'
props (svn:keywords, svn:eol-style, svn:executable) have changed.
Look for the edge-case where magic-props changed, but the
installation involves propchanges-only.  In this case, DEtranslate
and the REtranslate the working file.  This should fix the flip-side
of issue #646 that I discovered earlier this week.

author: dws
msg: * packages/rpm/expat.patch : Deleted - no longer necessary as expat-lite
directory no longer exists.
* packages/rpm/subversion.spec : Updated to require apache-2.0.37 and
neon-0.19.4. Took out expat.patch and sed script.
* packages/rpm/README : Updated for new apache and neon requirements.

author: striker
msg: * subversion/libsvn_delta/diff_file.c
(svn_diff__file_output_unified_line): Add a comment as to when
'\ No newline at end of file' is added.
(svn_diff__file_output_unified_flush_hunk): Add and update comments.
Break long lines.  Use apr_file_write instead of apr_file_printf
for output of the hunk content.  Also add error checking to that
operation.
(svn_diff__file_output_unified_default_hdr): Use a tab rather than
three spaces to seperate the path from the last modified time.
